page.title: 08ASHWELLTHORPE VILLAGE HALL
page.content: {The hub of village activities}- all villagers step inside this small but attractive village hall sometime or other.Mothers & Toddlers meet weekly & a popular Playgroup thrice-weekly.Keep Fit enthusiasts,Church youthclubs & Brownies gather here once a week.The Happy Circle for older people meets fortnightly & also runs monthly whist drives & the WI hold monthly meetings here.Used for meetings of a local pol- itical group monthly, it is also the parish polling station & the Parish Council now holds all its meetings here.It is the venue for jumble sales, bazaars,public meetings, wedding & private parties.Soon to start are pop- mobility & circuit training sessions aimed particularly at village youth. {Hire fees are lower for villagers & {for block-bookings but occasional fund {raising takes place to augment income.
